data.chText: 良心；良知
data.enText: the part of your mind that tells you whether your actions are right or wrong

data.chText: 问心无愧 / 有愧
data.enText: to have a clear/guilty conscience (= to feel that you have done right/wrong)

data.chText: 这关系个人的良知。
data.enText: This is a matter of individual conscience (= everyone must make their own judgement about it) .

data.chText: 他不会让这件事搞得自己良心不安。
data.enText: He won't let it trouble his conscience.

data.chText: 内疚；愧疚
data.enText: a guilty feeling about sth you have done or failed to do

data.chText: 她突然感到一阵内疚。
data.enText: She was seized by a sudden pang of conscience.

data.chText: 我对此事深感愧疚。
data.enText: I have a terrible conscience about it.

data.chText: 凭良心
data.enText: the fact of behaving in a way that you feel is right even though this may cause problems

data.chText: 凭良心行事的自由
data.enText: freedom of conscience (= the freedom to do what you believe to be right)

data.chText: 埃米莉亚在这出戏中是良知的代言人。
data.enText: Emilia is the voice of conscience in the play.
in (all/good) conscience

data.chText: （认为行为）公正地，公平地，凭良心
data.enText: believing your actions to be fair

data.chText: 凭良心我们不能拒绝去帮助别人。
data.enText: We cannot in all conscience refuse to help.
on your conscience

data.chText: 使人内疚；良心不安
data.enText: making you feel guilty for doing or failing to do sth

data.chText: 我要写信赔礼道歉。几个星期以来我都为此而良心不安。
data.enText: I'll write and apologize. I've had it on my conscience for weeks.
prick your conscience
your conscience pricks you

data.chText: 唤醒良心；受到良心谴责
data.enText: to make you feel guilty about sth; to feel guilty about sth

data.chText: 她对姐姐撒谎时良心上感到很不安。
data.enText: Her conscience pricked her as she lied to her sister.

simple_means.memory_skill: con 共同 + sci 知道 + ence 表行为 → 大家都知道，人要有良心 → 良心

data.enText: in (all/good) conscience

data.chText: （认为行为）公正地，公平地，凭良心
data.enText: believing your actions to be fair

data.chText: 凭良心我们不能拒绝去帮助别人。
data.enText: We cannot in all conscience refuse to help.
on your conscience

data.chText: 使人内疚；良心不安
data.enText: making you feel guilty for doing or failing to do sth

data.chText: 我要写信赔礼道歉。几个星期以来我都为此而良心不安。
data.enText: I'll write and apologize. I've had it on my conscience for weeks.
prick your conscience
your conscience pricks you

data.chText: 唤醒良心；受到良心谴责
data.enText: to make you feel guilty about sth; to feel guilty about sth

data.chText: 她对姐姐撒谎时良心上感到很不安。
data.enText: Her conscience pricked her as she lied to her sister.

tr: conformity to one's own sense of right conduct
a feeling of shame when you do something immoral
example: he has no conscience about his cruelty

tr: motivation deriving logically from ethical or moral principles that govern a person's thoughts and actions

value.def: Your conscience is the part of your mind that tells you whether what you are doing is right or wrong. If you have a guilty conscience, you feel guilty about something because you know it was wrong. If you have a clear conscience, you do not feel guilty because you know you have done nothing wrong.

example.ex: I have battled with my conscience over whether I should actually send this letter...
example.tran: 我备受良心的煎熬，不知是否真的应该把这封信寄出去。

example.ex: What if he got a guilty conscience and brought it back?...
example.tran: 要是他觉得内疚，把东西拿回来了怎么办？

example.ex: I could go away again with a clear conscience.
example.tran: 我可以问心无愧地再次离开。

gramarinfo.label: usu sing, with supp, oft poss N, adj N

value.def: Conscience is doing what you believe is right even though it might be unpopular, difficult, or dangerous.

example.ex: He refused for reasons of conscience to sign a new law legalising abortion.
example.tran: 他出于信仰，拒绝签署使堕胎合法化的新法。

example.ex: ...the law on freedom of conscience and religious organizations.
example.tran: 有关信仰自由和宗教组织自由的法律

value.def: Conscience is a feeling of guilt because you know you have done something that is wrong.

example.ex: I'm so glad he had a pang of conscience...
example.tran: 我很高兴他会有负疚感。

example.ex: They have shown a ruthless lack of conscience.
example.tran: 他们没有表现出丝毫内疚，实在是太无情了。

value.def: If you say that you cannot do something in all conscience ,in good conscience, or in conscience, you mean that you cannot do it because you think it is wrong.

example.ex: She could not, in good conscience, back out on her deal with him.
example.tran: 凭良心她不能背弃与他达成的协议。

value.def: If you have something on your conscience, you feel guilty because you know you have done something wrong.

example.ex: Now the murderer has two deaths on his conscience.
example.tran: 现在，这个杀人犯背着两条人命，受到了良心的谴责。

trans: (因政治或宗教信仰)被关押的人

partsOfSpeech.dec: con 共同 + sci 知道 + ence 表行为 → 大家都知道，人要有良心 → 良心
con 共同 + sci 知道 + ous …的 → 都知道该怎么做 → 自觉的
ne 无 + sci 知道 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 无知的
omni 全部 + sci 知道 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 全知道的 → 无所不知的
pre 预先 + sci 知道 + ence 表行为 → 预先知道 → 先见之明
pre 前；预先 + sci 知道 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 → 有先见之明的
pseudo 假 + science 科学；学问 → 伪科学
sci 知道 + ence 性质，状态，行为 → 知道，知识 → 学问
sci 知道 + ent 具有…性质的，关于…的 + ific 使…的 → 科学的
sub 下 + conscious 有意识的；自觉的 → 下意识的
